page.title: 17IVAN KESSEL GARAGES
page.content: In 1959 Ivan Kessel started business by the Summercourt crossroads selling petrol and cars. In 1963 he became a Volvo dealer. In 1964 he bought land across the road to enlarge his business. The garage sold petrol until 1970. Around that time the business spread to other towns in Cornwall to increase his sale of cars. In 1984 the garage sold 740 cars and about 7.2 people out of 10 came back to buy again. On the new site he built a servicing station. He sells Volvo and Mitsubishi vehicles.The Mitsubushis come from Tokyo and the Volvos come from Sweden.The company relies on advertisment and the use of the telephone to sell its cars because it is a village business.
